title: Compare selection of president in Iran and Nigeria

content.question:
Describe one similarity in the procedure for selecting the President in Iran and in Nigeria. 

Describe two differences in the procedure for selecting the President in Iran and in Nigeria. 

Explain why the Nigerian President has more power than the Iranian President.

frqParts.text:
Describe one similarity in the procedure for selecting the President in Iran and in Nigeria. 

Describe two differences in the procedure for selecting the President in Iran and in Nigeria. 

Explain why the Nigerian President has more power than the Iranian President.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
